name: Complex designer project
description: Create complex user interfaces for 32-bit microcontrollers with the powerful LVGL library.
files_included:
**CMakeLists.txt:** Configuration file for building your project.
**main.c:** A main file with ready-to-use initialization logic.
**main_screen.mscr:** A blank main screen.
**main_screen.c:** Source file with code for screen initialization.
outputs:
**.hex:** Hexadecimal binary for MCU flashing.
**.bin:** Raw binary for various deployment options.
requirements:
mikroSDK
Clock: > 64 MHz
Flash/ROM: > 180 kB
RAM: > 48 kB
